sentences: Megurine Luka (巡音ルカ) is a persona voiced by a singing synthesizer application developed by Crypton Future Media, headquartered in Sapporo, Japan.
Luka was developed by Crypton Future Media using Yamaha's Vocaloid 2.
On March 19, 2015, a new version of Luka developed for Vocaloid 4, called Megurine Luka V4X, was released containing a package of 6 vocals - 4 for Japanese and 2 for English.
